item.title: Exposed Livestream
item.description:
Title: Exposed Livestream
Genre: Adventure , RPG
Developer: Kumada Gaon
Publisher: Saikey Studios
Franchise: Saikey Studios
Release Date: 11 Apr, 2025




About This Game

Laika, an IRL streamer, didn't find much success after nearly a year of content creation. After an embarrassing accident during one of her streams, her chat went wild, and after a couple of generous donations, she noticed her subscriber count went up!

With new subscribers needing to be entertained she decided to expand her activities to also post videos, but she needs ideas.

Play as Laika, by managing her day-to-day activities. Brainstorm new ideas by going around the city to find inspiration, make videos, interact with viewers on stream, post pictures for your community to enjoy, and build Laika’s community through her social media!

Manage your sanity

The lower Laika’s sanity is the more activities she’s willing to do. How far you ask? Let’s just say there are few things Laika will let stand in the way of her fame.

Day and night cycle

Make videos during the day, and stream at night, that’s the daily grind of a girl seeking internet fame! Change between day and night to explore the city and encounter many events as Laika becomes more daring with her content.

Events / Recollection room

Laika will encounter many people, from strangers to her fans. Explore the city and hunt down events to progress her streaming journey and enjoy what shenanigans Laika gets up to in her videos and streams.

Prank People for Content

Balance between your chat’s entertainment and the alertness of the people you prank at night. The more you entertain the chat the more donations you’ll get, but the more alert the people you prank are, the greater the chance you’ll get caught and reported to the authorities.

Learn and improve your skills

Learn from The Master and expand your skill tree so you can tackle the challenges of a small time content creator with lofty goals!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • Storage: 500 MB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Aviassembly
item.description:
Title: Aviassembly
Genre: Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Jelle Booij
Publisher: Jelle Booij
Release Date: 11 Apr, 2025
Early Access Release Date: 11 Apr, 2025




About This Game

Build A Plane

Create your own plane . Balance fuel capacity, weight, speed, cargo space and more. Choose parts carefully to optimize your plane for the desired flight characteristics.

Complete Missions

Test your plane, complete missions, and earn money. You'll need to haul different cargo types, each with unique requirements, so plan your trips carefully and avoid running out of fuel.

Research and Upgrade

Research new parts and improve your designs to fly farther, faster, and carry more cargo. Upgrade your plane to handle bigger missions and explore new areas.

Explore

Explore an open world and find new airports and islands, each offering new challenges to test your plane designs and piloting skills.

Features

  • Build your own airplane and optimize its performance.

  • Takeoff, fly and land your plane with physics based controls.

  • Explore and discover new biomes, each offering unique challenges and cargo types.

  • Transport and sell different cargo types. Each cargo type offers its own unique challenge.

  • Get creative in creative mode. Use your infinite resources to build anything you can imagine.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Window 10
    • Processor: Intel Core I5 4460 3.20 Ghz or equivalent
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 300 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Wild Assault
item.description:
Title: Wild Assault
Genre: Action , Adventure , Massively Multiplayer , Early Access
Developer: Combat Cat Studio
Publisher: Combat Cat Studio
Release Date: 11 Apr, 2025
Early Access Release Date: 11 Apr, 2025




About This Game

Welcome to "Wild Assault".

This third-person PvP shooting game was developed using Unreal Engine 5, where you are about to embark on a unique furry warfare experience that integrates intense battles, teamwork, and ingenious animal hero abilities.

Anthro heroes & heroines with unique abilities based on animal instincts. Unleash their primal power with your wisdom and achieve victory together!

Different styles, different origins, different goals, same battleground!

Wild Assault provides a free-choice experience based on weapon classes.

Whether you're a cool-headed marksman or a brave assault player, in Wild Assault you can always enjoy the most exhilarating shooting experience.

All characters in Wild Assault have their unique abilities based on animal instincts.

It's more than just shooting combat - help the characters unleash their primal powers to achieve victory!

Wild Assault offers a 20 vs 20 team-based battleground gaming experience.

From capturing strongholds to frontline assaults and defenses, utilize characters' high mobility on all fours and unique abilities to secure victory. It's a test of skill and strategy!

Assault, expert, medic, marksman, and much more!

Unleash your wisdom and creativity to match different classes for the squad. Maximize the team's strength!

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5 6600K
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 or Intel ARC A380
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or Intel Core i7 4790
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT or Intel ARC A750
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 30 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Required

item.title: PLATiNA :: LAB
item.description:
Title: PLATiNA :: LAB
Genre: Action , Casual , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: HIGH-END Games
Publisher: HIGH-END Games
Release Date: 10 Apr, 2025
Early Access Release Date: 10 Apr, 2025




About This Game

An unpredictable world of data
Rhythm play with squishy, quirky DBs!

‘PLATiNA :: LAB’ is a rhythm game that features a classic top-down note drop play style.

Play a variety of tracks across different genres, connect with unique and charming DB(character) units, and discover the distinctive appeal that only PLATiNA :: LAB can offer.

● Enjoyable gameplay for everyone

From beginners to rhythm game veterans, players can enjoy the game at their own skill level.

There are two play styles to choose from: 4LINES and 6LINES .
They may look similar, but each offers a different kind of fun.

Additionally, each mode features a PLUS Pattern, introducing special pattern twists for deeper gameplay.

Follow the rhythm of each track and aim for higher scores by mastering the patterns!

● A music lineup to suit every taste

From popular songs featured in well-known games and anime,
to hit tracks from acclaimed rhythm game artists around the world—
PLATiNA :: LAB also offers a wide range of exclusive original tracks available only in this game.

Whether you're a rhythm game enthusiast or someone new to the genre,
you'll find something to enjoy.

● Gameplay-focused features that maximize rhythm game fun

We’ve thoughtfully designed the system from the ground up to enhance the core joy of rhythm gameplay.

Features like the Section System , which shows changes in pattern trends across 5 segments of a song,
and the P.A.T.C.H , which reflects your accumulated performance and helps track your growth,
provide a rich and rewarding play experience.

● A captivating, fully-voiced story

The data world has mysteriously been locked away,
and PLATiNA :: LAB is in the midst of intense research to restore it.

Join researchers Airing , Bambi , and Cake as you encounter a variety of DB units and uncover the secrets hidden within this strange world.

Dive into an exciting, fully-voiced story set in a unique universe
and immerse yourself in the mystery of the data realm!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10, Version 22H2
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Processor, AMD Ryzen™ 5 Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R7 370
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10, Version 22H2
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Processor, AMD Ryzen™ 5 Processor
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
    • Sound Card: ASIO

item.title: Monaco 2
item.description:
Title: Monaco 2
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Strategy
Developer: Pocketwatch Games
Publisher: Humble Games
Franchise: Humble Games , Monaco
Release Date: 10 Apr, 2025




About This Game

THE JOB

Monaco is a city overflowing with luxury and greed, which makes it a perfect target for you and your international gang of criminal masterminds. The best of the best have been assembled, and they’ll need to work together using their unique abilities to rob the city blind. Do you and your friends have what it takes to bring the city of Monaco to its knees?

THE CREW

They say there’s no honor among thieves, but they’ve never met your crew! Team up with up to three other players in local or online multiplayer and plan your heist. However, nothing ever goes exactly according to plan in Monaco, so you’ll need to work together and improvise if you want to get away with your haul of riches.

New characters mean all new ways to play! Assemble your team from a selection of eight playable characters, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Need to adapt? Switch your character mid-run to overcome whatever obstacles stand between you and untold riches!

THE PLAN

Every heist requires careful planning. With Blueprint Mode, you can look at the level’s layout before you start the mission, allowing you to case the joint before you and your friends fleece it for all its worth.

Monaco 2 offers a new level of immersion with an updated 3D art style and a procedurally generated level design system. Complete the structured campaign or test your skills against the hundreds of seeded levels, proving once and for all that you and your friends are the ultimate thieves!

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 2gb graphics card
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 8gb or better
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
